            // Confirms permanant action with warning
            function doConfirm() {
                var answer = confirm("This is a permanent action. Please Confirm.")
	            if (answer){
	                return true;
	            }

		            return false;
	            }

            // Calcs Total Cost of Premium PR &amp;&amp; Toggles 'Free Press Release' (i.e. Create) and Paypal buttons
            function getTotalCost() {
                sTotalCost = 0;
                if (document.getElementById('cbImg') != null &amp;&amp; document.getElementById('cbImg').checked == true) {
                    document.getElementById('amount_1').value = 10;
                    sTotalCost = sTotalCost + 10;
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('amount_1').value = 0;
                }
                if (document.getElementById('cbLinks') != null &amp;&amp; document.getElementById('cbLinks').checked == true) {
                    document.getElementById('amount_2').value = 10;
                    sTotalCost = sTotalCost + 10;
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('amount_2').value = 0;
                }
                if (document.getElementById('cbFPR') != null &amp;&amp; document.getElementById('cbFPR').checked == true) {     //tbFPRCost
                    sTotalCost = sTotalCost + Number(document.getElementById('tbFPRCost').value);
                    document.getElementById('amount_3').value = Number(document.getElementById('tbFPRCost').value);
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('amount_3').value = 0;
                }
                if (sTotalCost &gt; 0) {
                    document.getElementById('lblTotalCost').innerHTML = 'Total Cost: ' + formatNumber(sTotalCost.toString(), '$') + '&nbsp;&nbsp;';
                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnFreePR').style.visibility = "hidden";
                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnPayPal').style.visibility = "visible";
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById('lblTotalCost').innerHTML = '';
                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnFreePR').style.visibility = "visible";
                    document.getElementById('cphMain_btnPayPal').style.visibility = "hidden";
                }
                return true;
            }
            
            // Converts $ to impressions
            function getNumImpressions(objThis, strThatID) {
                var spend = objThis.value;
                var numImps = spend * 1000; 
                
                if (spend &gt;= 100) {
                    numImps = numImps * 3;
                }
                
                strVal = formatNumber(numImps, '');
                document.getElementById(strThatID).innerHTML = strVal;
                getTotalCost();
                return true;
            }

            // Formats numbers by adding commas (and prefix could be '$')
            function formatNumber(nStr, prefix) {
                var prefix = prefix || '';
                nStr += '';
                x = nStr.split('.');
                x1 = x[0];
                x2 = x.length &gt; 1 ? '.' + x[1] : '';
                var rgx = /(\d+)(\d{3})/;
                while (rgx.test(x1))
                    x1 = x1.replace(rgx, '$1' + ',' + '$2');
                return prefix + x1 + x2;
            }
            
            // Following 3 functions used to display field limits
            function objLimit(objThis, objMax) {
                if (objThis.value.length == objMax) return false;
	            return true;
            }
            function objCount(objThis, objID, objMax) {
                objObj = createObject(objID);
                objVal = objThis.value;
                //if (objVal) objVal = objVal.replace(/(\r\n)/g, '\n');   // USE objVal.replace(/(\r\n)/g, '\n') OR objVal.replace('\r\n', '\n')
	            if (objVal.length &gt; objMax) objVal = objVal.substring(0, objMax);
	            //if (objObj) objObj.innerText = objMax - objVal.length;
	            if (objObj) objObj.innerHTML = objMax - objVal.length;
	            return true;
            }
            function createObject(objId) {
	            if (document.getElementById) return document.getElementById(objId);
	            else if (document.layers) return eval("document." + objId);
	            else if (document.all) return eval("document.all." + objId);
	            else return eval("document." + objId);
            }
            
            //--&gt;

               </span>

                Being the best mobile app development company, Parangat technologies always endeavor to deliver robust, scalable and cost-effective mobile app development services.
               </span>
               <br/>
               <br/>
               <div id="cphMain_Panel_Button" style="width:100%;">
                <!-- Google Link Ad -->
                <div style="display:block; float:left; margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;">

                <i>

                  BriefingWire.com

                </i>
               </span>
               <span class="ContentSmallGrey" id="cphMain_Label_Body2">
               </span>
               <span class="ContentSmall" id="cphMain_Label_Body3">
                Parangat Technologies is a leading mobile app development company, based in India. Since inception, they are developing apps on Android, Windows, iOS and BlackBerry platforms. Nowadays, every business and brands are adopting Mobile-first philosophy. And, thats why everybody wants one! Getting a right app developed for your business needs a proper strategy &amp; consulting, captivating &amp;human-centric designs, kink-free coding and right marketing strategy. However if you have a small budget, or perhaps your requirements are not right for a mobile app, then you may consider a mobile enabled website instead.
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Being the best-in-class mobile app development company, Parangat has always delivered top-notch mobile solutions to clients across the world, till date. When its clients choose them, they partner with the most cost-effective and experienced team that has been strategizing, designing and developing robust, scalable, feature-rich and business-centric mobile apps for years. At Parangat, they have the most experienced, dexterous and tech-savvy mobile apps developers. Their highly skilled team of consultants, designers, developers and marketers has in-depth knowledge of all the major platforms and frameworks that are used for mobile app development. With a team of over 50 experienced consultants,  developers, designers, creative engineers and marketers, they can help you get your app developed that will meet your business goals. They develop apps that help their clients address their business challenges and meet promises to the marketplace.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Being the best mobile application development company, they are adept in building apps on various domains that includes Enterprise, Healthcare, Wearable, Augmented, social, retail etc. Their mobile app developers have experience and expertise in developing user, data and performance-centric apps using cloud web services like iCloud, Rackspace, Azure, AWS (Amazon Web Services), Dropbox, Content Delivery Networks and Amazon S3 etc. One of the most valuable assets is their employees, who believe in developing apps that are expertly positioned for success. In addition to their best-in-class programming and designing skills, they do extensive market and competitive analysis to gauge what their clients business needs to provide well positioned and profitable launch.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 They highly focus on consulting because they believe that an apps success depends on how thorough they have done the analysis of the app. With former experience on all the industry verticals and platforms, their developers are known in the industry as the Top Tech coders. Till date, they have delivered thousands of apps to serve clients across the world. With over 5 years of experience and expertise in delivering top-notch mobile solutions, Parangat specializes in creative design, smart strategy, right implementation, kink-free development and deployment of web and mobile apps for global clients to bring them ahead of the competition.
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 About Parangat Technologies
                </p>
                <p>
                </p>
                <p>
                 Parangat Technologies is known to provide 100% Customer Satisfaction and believe in building enduring business relationship to help meet their client's business expectations and achieve their business goals. They are known to deliver create enduring value to their clients' business by delivering robust, scalable and user-centric web and mobile solutions.
                </p>
